thread.title: Comment Of The Day: The Island Of Misfit GM Performance Cars
thread.title_full: Comment Of The Day: The Island Of Misfit GM Performance Cars

author: Raphael Orlove
title: Comment Of The Day: The Island Of Misfit GM Performance Cars
text:
Go to permalink I spotted an old Saab Sonett III while I was on a press launch for the Chevy SS however many years ago that was. Photo Credit: Raphael Orlove 
I sometimes wonder if thereâ€™s a place where all of the Fieros and Corvair Monzas can drive free, safe from the confused hands of General Motors. 
Certainly, another vehicle has gone there today, up to the track day in the sky. We will always miss the Chevrolet SS, the perfectly satisfactory family car that happens to do massive burnouts if you so desire.
